mapper.sql: ID, PROJECT_ID, STATUS, ADDRESS, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, TENDER_TIME, RESPONSE_TIME, SUPPLIET_ID, SUPPLIET_FROM, EXTRACT_ADDRESS
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION (ID, PROJECT_ID, STATUS, ADDRESS, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID, TENDER_TIME, RESPONSE_TIME, SUPPLIET_FROM, EXTRACT_ADDRESS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplietFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION
PROJECT_ID,
STATUS,
ADDRESS,
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID,
TENDER_TIME,
RESPONSE_TIME,
SUPPLIET_FROM,
EXTRACT_ADDRESS,
#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplietFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE},
RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIET_FROM = #{supplietFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERTS_TYPE_ID = #{expertsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENDER_TIME = #{tenderTime,jdbcType=DATE}, RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIET_FROM = #{supplietFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTRACT_ADDRESS = #{extractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.*, CT."ID" AS ctid, CT.CATEGORY_NAME,CT.SUPPLIE_COUNT,CT.SUPPLIE_QUALIFICATION,CT.SUPPLIE_TYPE_ID,CT.CATEGORY_ID ,CT.IS_MULTICONDITION FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CONDITION sc LEFT JOIN T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIE_CON_TYPE ct ON SC."ID"=CT.CONDITION_ID
